critique: The document is a presidential order that reverses a previous policy banning transgender individuals from serving in the military. It emphasizes diversity and inclusion, citing studies that show no negative impact on military readiness. It directs the Secretary of Defense and Secretary of Homeland Security to implement policies consistent with allowing transgender individuals to serve openly and to correct the records of those previously discharged. The order also includes general provisions to ensure it is implemented within the bounds of existing law and does not create new enforceable rights.
